typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Saledate as string,
		saleItem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename') ~> SalesDataSrc
SalesDataSrc split(isNull(toDate(Saledate,'dd-MMM-yy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(BadRows, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplit@GoodRows derive(Saledate = toDate(Saledate, 'dd-MMM-yy')) ~> ChangeSalesDate
ConditionalSplit@BadRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Saledate as date,
		saleItem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer,
		filename as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Saledate,
		saleItem,
		country,
		quantity,
		filename
	)) ~> SalesBadRows
ChangeSalesDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Saledate as string,
		saleItem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as string,
		filename as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Saledate,
		saleItem,
		country,
		quantity,
		filename
	)) ~> SalesGoodRows
